attributes.action: stop emulating Robert Mugabe by denying that anybody who is not a Nu-Labour apparatchik can be right about the devastatingly damaging effects that Nu-Labour policies are having upon this once proud and democratic country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown is a failed scottish constituency MP who has interest only his own self-enrichment.  The fact that this country is going down the tubes over too much immigration - which is being told to him, and us, by eminently more qualified and intellectually wise individuals than a failed scottish constituency MP who no longer has a constituency - which is what he is - (AND I MAKE NO APOLOGY FOR REPEATING MYSELF) and who has NEVER received ONE SINGLE vote from the people having, now, to pay for his nefarious and downright deceitful activities in governance of this country.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action.
Also similar to http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NOimmigration/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
